docs.text: Introduction Welcome to the SilverPython site. SilverPython is an upcoming open-source discord bot, designed to help people with their Discord to ROBLOX needs Planned Features search - Searches the ROBLOX platform for someone promote - Promotes someone to the next rank in the configured group demote - Demotes someone to the preceding rank in the configured group setrank - Sets/changes someones rank afr - Accepts someones friend request dfr - Declines someones friend request shout - Changes the configured group's shout Security SilverPython is an open-source bot. The developers have no access to any of your configuration. Be sure to check in on this site time to time, for updates on development, or release times! Bye!
docs.title: Introduction
